name: Charge Simulator
description:
__________Charge Simulator by Quantum_HG_______________

# This is a simple simulation of electric charges in 

  Quantum_HG's custom made "Quantum Engine" using SDL2

# Mainly for demonstration purposes

Get all of my stuff here:- https://quantum-hg.itch.io

More Simulations and videos :- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUxoYZlby3HtgVZ3CHsv8qw

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE

# left click to spawn a positive charge (red in color)

# right click to spawn a negative charge (blue in color)

# press middle mouse button and hover over to delete a charge

# while holding left CTRL key, middle mouse click on a charge 

  and drag in the desired direction to give a velocity

# while holding left SHIFT key, hover onto a charge to grab it
